newsitem.title: GERMANY: German Baden-Wuerttemberg Feb inflation up 0.4 pct.
newsitem.headline: German Baden-Wuerttemberg Feb inflation up 0.4 pct.

text.p: The German state of Baden-Wuerttemberg said on Tuesday that February consumer prices rose 0.4 percent month-on-month and rose 1.7 percent year-on-year.
The state was the second of four German states to report consumer price data which is used to compute provisional west German inflation.
The state of Hesse said earlier on Tuesday that consumer prices rose 0.3 percent month-on-month and were up 1.5 percent year-on-year. --Frankfurt Newsroom, +49 69 756525
